name: Basic Engine NG Asteroids
description:
This is my version of Asteroids written for the Basic Engine NG as a test to literally get back to BASIC. It's a conversion of my Pico-8 and Lua versions. Converted from LUA to Engine BASIC.

The code needs cleaning up, there's an orphan function or two in there I didn't end up using in the end but the game works!

Definitely needs some playtesting, so if you find a bug leave a comment :)

Enjoy :)
